text: Oreta andrema is a moth in the family Drepanidae. It was described by Wilkinson in 1972. It is found in Nepal and China (Tibet)., 2012: Revision of Chinese Oretinae (Lepidoptera, Drepanidae). Zootaxa 3445: 1-36. ==References== Category:Moths described in 1972 Category:Drepaninae
title: Oreta andrema
